definitions: (of a record of events) following the order in which they occurred

examples.text: the entries are in chronological order

shortDefinitions: following order in which they occurred

definitions: calculated in terms of the passage of time

examples.text: medical decisions should be based on the individual's biological age, not chronological age

shortDefinitions: calculated in terms of passage of time

definitions: relating to the establishment of dates of past events

examples.text: the diary provided a chronological framework for the events

shortDefinitions: relating to establishment of dates of past events
